thread.title: A Nobel for Arab Democracy

author: wsjcom
title: A Nobel for Arab Democracy
text:
The list of undeserving and sometimes repugnant Nobel Peace Prize winners is long. But this year the Norwegian Committee got it right by selecting civil-society activists who played a pivotal role in Tunisiaâ€™s transition to democracy.
Known as the Tunisian National Dialogue Quartet, the group united business leaders, labor-union organizers, lawyers and human-rights activists to promote reconciliation and pluralism when the divide...
